page.title: 04LIFE STYLES A WEDDING
page.content: A Wedding between two Yarmouth residents who attended the local primary school. They will continue to have a home in Yarmouth though their work will take them all over the world {The Wedding by Stephanie aged 8 On Saturday there was a weddng. The bride and her father walk down the aisle. At the end of the aisle the groom stands by the bride then the Rector stands by them and speaks to them.We sang Morning has Broken then the Rector said the promises and the bride and groom said them too.The groom gave the ring to the bride. The bride wore a white gown with bows on it. The groom wore a black suit with a flower on. They had three bridesmaids who wore navyblue and white sailor dresses and straw hats. After the wedding they went to the George Hotel to have a party.
